room_address: 5465 Mills Civic Parkway, Ste 120 West Des Moines, IA 50266
room_description:
Dr. Shaston Gunter, a talented chemical engineer, has been admitted to the Woodland Regional Psychiatric Hospital after being diagnosed with dissociative personality disorder due to the psychotic break from the loss of his brother. Convinced his brother was murdered by negligence from city environmental health officials, just before being admitted, Dr. Gunter sought revenge with a plan to release a toxic chemical somewhere in the city.
Authorities believe he's left clues to the toxin's location somewhere in his hospital room and your team has been given access to discover where it's been hidden. Find out before it spreads to the city and it's too late!
